name: warsow.vim
summary: Syntax script for WarSoW player config and HUD files
description:
This is a syntax script for WarSoW game config and hud script files. It features all commands, variables and keywords for player config files and variables, constants and operators for HUD scripting files.

Changelog:
1.0.21 Release (2.01.2007)
- update for War§oW 0.21 version changes
- added dynvars

Visit project page on:
http://www.haze.ehost.pl/spoonman/index.php5?p=8

Examples (using dusk.vim colorscheme):
http://www.haze.ehost.pl/spoonman/images/warsow-vim1.png
http://www.haze.ehost.pl/spoonman/images/warsow-vim2.png

Your suggestions are very welcome. I plan to maintain and update this file as WarSoW development continues.
install_details:
Download and unzip into your $HOME/syntax/ directory.
:set syntax=warsow

versions.release_notes:
1.0.21 Release (2.01.2007)
- update for War§oW 0.21 version changes
